attributes.action: STOP THE DIGITAL ID PLAN BECOMING MANDATORY
attributes.additional_details: This is something that we don't need, it needs to be put up for a public referendum
attributes.background: This plan needs to be put to the public for a vote

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
